imdb.title: Show by Rock!!
imdb.plot: In Midi City, the center of Sound Planet, music is everything. From friendships to rivalries to battles, music is the key to it all.

episodes.title: Tokiko's R-R-R-Room (Plasmagica)
episodes.plot: This week's Tokiko's R-R-R-Room features Plasmagica.

episodes.title: Fire Away! Puting our crimson flame into a white ball
episodes.plot: SHINGANCRIMSONZ takes a trip to Midi Cians spa resort.

episodes.title: Tokiko's R-R-R-Room (Criticrista)
episodes.plot: Criticrista are guests on this week's Tokiko's R-R-R-Room.

episodes.title: The Friends of Bamboo Island
episodes.plot: A and Un's fateful meeting on Bamboo Island.

episodes.title: Tokiko's R-R-R-Room (Trichronika)
episodes.plot: Trichronika makes their third appearance on Tokiko's R-R-R-Room.

episodes.title: A Fateful Encounter
episodes.plot: The origin of the band Tsurezurenaru Ayatsuri Mugenan is revealed!

episodes.title: Tokiko's R-R-R-Room (SHINGANCRIMSONZ)
episodes.plot: This week's Tokiko's R-R-R-Room guests are SHINGANCRIMSONZ.

episodes.title: Spa Resort Midicians Commercial Making-Of
episodes.plot: Go behind the scenes with Criticrista to see how the Spa Resort Midicians commercial was made.

episodes.title: Tokiko's R-R-R-Room (Tsurezurenaru Ayatsuri Mugenan)
episodes.plot: Tsurezurenaru Ayatsuri Mugenan pay a visit in this week's Tokiko's R-R-R-Room.

episodes.title: St Midi Girls' Academy Middle School's Special Lecture on Coyness
episodes.plot: The girls from Criticrista learn how to act coy during this special lecture.

episodes.title: MIDI-BOP Graffiti High School
episodes.plot: High school delinquents take the stage in this final episode before season two.

episodes.title: Song of the Lanterns on the 16th Night
episodes.plot: Cyan is undergoing special training with King to prepare her to write a new song. Meanwhile, SHINGANCRIMSONZ is also training for their rematch!

episodes.title: Re: Climb
episodes.plot: SHINGANCRIMSONZ is about to have their rematch against ARCAREAFACT. Will they be able to win with their new song?!

episodes.title: Eternal Bonds
episodes.plot: It's finally time for Plasmagica's battle of the bands against BVL, but will they be able to overcome Ailane's darkness?

episodes.title: Solitude of Judgment
episodes.plot: Victorious reveals her true form in the fight with Dagger and a shocking truth is revealed about BVL and Aion's past.

episodes.title: My Resolution
episodes.plot: Victorious's past is revealed, and Cyan and the others prepare for the Puru Land concert by writing a new song.

episodes.title: My Song is YOU
episodes.plot: It's time for that final battle with Victorious! Can Maple defeat her with his giant robot? Will the power of music prevail?

episodes.title: Have a Nice MUSIC!!
episodes.plot: Cyan Hijirikawa longs to join the band at school, but is too shy. While worrying about it at home, she's transported to another dimension...

episodes.title: With Our Crimson Gaze.. (Etc)
episodes.plot: Cyan learns more about Sound World and meets SHINGANCRIMSONZ. She sees the power of music firsthand when she watches them play.

episodes.title: Yes! Idol Declaration
episodes.plot: Plasmagica gets entered into a battle of the bands against Criticrista, the hot new all-girl band in Midi City. Will they be able to win?!

episodes.title: Enchanting Dream Fireworks of a Night Journey
episodes.plot: Plasmagica goes to see the concert of a popular band called Tsurezurenaru Ayatsuri Mugenan and are taken in by their originality and stage presence.

episodes.title: Maze of DESTINY
episodes.plot: Cyan has to fight the dark monsters, but what will she do when she has to choose between performing with her band or protecting Sound World?

episodes.title: Ba-dump!? It's a Beach Training Camp Full of Swimsuits
episodes.plot: After everyone discovers the truth about Cyan, Maple proposes a training camp as they prepare new songs for the Grateful Rock Festival.

episodes.title: Yokai Street
episodes.plot: Something strange is going on at Yokai Street, the hot new spot for street performances. Can Cyan and the others help solve the mystery?

episodes.title: Crimson Quartet
episodes.plot: Plasmagica hasn't performed enough concerts to play in the Grateful Rock Festival, and Aion's gloominess is causing problems with his bandmates.

episodes.title: Falling Star Dreamline
episodes.plot: It's time for Plasmagica's battle of the bands rematch with Criticrista. Will they be able to beat them with their new song?!

episodes.title: Reverse Rhapsody
episodes.plot: As Plasmagica practices for the Grateful Rock Festival, Strawberry Heart warns the girls about Dagger's plans, but Chuchu's ambitions take a dark turn...

episodes.title: Grateful Rock Festival
episodes.plot: The day of the Grateful Rock Festival has finally come, and as the bands get ready to perform, Cyan worries about the dark monsters...

episodes.title: Our Youth Is Non-Stop!
episodes.plot: It's time for the final showdown against Dagger! Will Cyan and the others be able to defeat him once and for all?!
